mapper.insert: insert into user(user_id, user_name, user_pwd, user_bDate, user_gen, user_tel, user_addr, user_joinDate, user_email) value(#{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{user_pwd}, #{user_bDate}, #{user_gen}, #{user_tel}, #{user_addr}, #{user_joinDate}, #{user_email})
mapper.select: select user_pwd from user where user_id = #{user_id}
